# 1931 Washington & Jefferson Presidents football team

The 1931 Washington & Jefferson Presidents football team was an American football team that represented Washington & Jefferson College as an independent during the 1931 college football season. The team compiled a 6â€“4 record and outscored opponents by a total of 112 to 89. Bill Amos was the head coach.
